rt

Interface Camera

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DummyCamera, FixedCamera, PinholeCamera

    public interface Camera

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Ray makeWorldSpaceRay(int i, int j, int k, float[][] samples)
      Make a ray in world space according to the camera specifications.

    • Method Detail

      • makeWorldSpaceRay

        Ray makeWorldSpaceRay(int i,
                    int j,
                    int k,
                    float[][] samples)
        Make a ray in world space according to the camera specifications.
        Parameters:
        i - pixel column index
        j - pixel row index
        k - sample to be used
        samples - array of n-dimensional samples. Use the first two dimensions to sample the image plane. The samples need to be in the range [0,1].
        Returns:
